PropertyDef.Name: HeatRejectionRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Sum of the refrigeration effect and the heat equivalent of the power input to the compressor.

PropertyDef.Name: ExteriorHeatTransferCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: Exterior heat transfer coefficient associated with exterior surface area.

PropertyDef.Name: InteriorHeatTransferCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: Interior heat transfer coefficient associated with interior surface area.

PropertyDef.Name: RefrigerantFoulingResistance
PropertyDef.Definition: Fouling resistance on the refrigerant side.

PropertyDef.Name: LogarithmicMeanTemperatureDifference
PropertyDef.Definition: Logarithmic mean temperature difference between refrigerant and water or air.

PropertyDef.Name: UAcurves
PropertyDef.Definition: UV = f (VExterior, VInterior), UV as a function of interior and exterior fluid flow velocity at the entrance.

PropertyDef.Name: CompressorEvaporatorHeatGain
PropertyDef.Definition: Heat gain between the evaporator outlet and the compressor inlet.

PropertyDef.Name: CompressorEvaporatorPressureDrop
PropertyDef.Definition: Pressure drop between the evaporator outlet and the compressor inlet.
